S.FORM: == Ben Affleck == kawas tay 1972, ryax sa tay 15 nqu tay 8, Ben Affleck, squliq na Bunge'. qnxan nya(qyanux nya) Ben Affleck maki tay kawas 1980 msqun ki Jennifer Anne Garner, maki tay kawas 2018 t'alax. kawas tay 1927,ryax sa tay 15 nqu tay 8, Ben Affleck htagan beh sa Berkeley California. cyugal kawas nya,qutux ngasal nha musa maki beh Massachusetts. hiya yaya nya ga sinsiy pcbaq biru, mtzyaw beh Harvard-educated pqwasan laqi cikuy pcbaq laqi. cinkhulan sa knita' sa brbiru' Lists of actors

== Ben Affleck == kawas tay 1972, ryax sa tay 15 nqo tay 8, Ben Affleck, sqoliq na Bonge'. qnxan nya(qyanox nya) Ben Affleck maki tay kawas 1980 msqon ki Jennifer Anne Garner, maki tay kawas 2018 t'alax. kawas tay 1927,ryax sa tay 15 nqo tay 8, Ben Affleck htagan beh sa Berkeley California. cyogal kawas nya,qotox ngasal nha mosa maki beh Massachosetts. hiya yaya nya ga sinsiy pcbaq biro, mtzyaw beh Harvard-edocated pqwasan laqi cikoy pcbaq laqi. cinkholan sa knita' sa brbiro' Lists of actors
